cards.name: Hack
cards.description:
Deal 9 (12) damage.
If you have
3 Orb slots or less,
gain 1 Orb slot.

cards.name: Scanner Beam
cards.description:
Deal 4 (7) damage and
apply 1 Lock-On
to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Trial and Error
cards.description: Deal 7 (9) damage for every 5 cards in your discard pile.

cards.name: Cloaking Shadows
cards.description:
If you have Dark,
gain 13 (17) Block.
If not, Channel 2 Dark.

cards.name: Convert
cards.description: Remove (Evoke) the rightmost Lightning. If you do so, gain [B] [B].

cards.name: Debris Cloud
cards.description:
The first time
an Orb is Evoked each
round, add 1 Debris
into your hand.

cards.name: Glimmer of Hope
cards.description:
If your hand is empty,
Channel 1 Plasma.
Draw 2 (3) cards.

cards.name: Hibernate
cards.description:
Channel 2 (3) Frost.
You cannot gain
Block from cards
for 2 turns.

cards.name: Integrate
cards.description:
Gain 5 (8) Block.
If you have 3
Orb slots or more,
lose 1 slot and gain
4 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Juggle
cards.description:
Evoke up to 2 (3) Orbs
and draw that
many cards.

cards.name: Afterburner
cards.description:
Deal 7 (9) damage
to a random
enemy X times.
Evoke all your Plasma.

cards.name: Automation
cards.description:
Gain 3 (4) Focus.
Whenever an Orb is
Channelled, Evoke it.

cards.name: Heavy-Duty
cards.description:
(Innate.)
If you do not
play any Power
during your turn,
gain 1 Artifact.

cards.name: Polymorphism
cards.description:
Choose 1 of 3
non-Blue Powers to
add into your hand.
It costs 1 less
this turn. Exhaust.
